Phrases.BuyLevel: This level costs 20 orbs. Earn them ingame or buy more in the shop.
Phrases.CantBuyLevel: It requires 20 orbs to buy level 7.
Phrases.ShopText: This is a mock up shop.
Phrases.DoYouWantToExit: Do you want to exit the game?
Phrases.CouldNotLoadDatabaseReinstall: Couldn't load database. Please reinstall the game from Play Store
Phrases.AlreadyUsed: The Sign is already used for something else
Phrases.LastLevelInfo: You have reached the last level of the game....for now. Check back for more levels soon.

hints.callOver: A waving gesture for uniting people
hints.stay: If you tell a dog to sit it ***** put
hints.stick: It’s brown and can be set on fire
hints.firepit: A pan I would not eat from
hints.font: It can contain several buckets of water, looks like a birdbath
hints.pool: An endless supply of water at your disposal
hints.key: It’s tiny, it’s shiny.. but it’s the only means to get out!
hints.door: Can be opened with a certain shiny little object.
hints.bucket: Can be used to transport fluids.
